solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public static int triangleNumber(int[] A) {--newline--        Arrays.sort(A);--newline--        int count = 0, n = A.length;--newline--        for (int i=n-1;i>=2;i--) {--newline--            int l = 0, r = i-1;--newline--            while (l < r) {--newline--                if (A[l] + A[r] > A[i]) {--newline--                    count += r-l;--newline--                    r--;--newline--                }--newline--                else l++;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return count;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
